articles.author: Sujith Somraaj
articles.description: The ultrasound money meme is taking life, with Ethereum’s daily token issuance dropping following the network upgrade.
articles.title: Ethereum Token Issuance Plummets 95% Following Merge

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Nostalgia alert! LeBron James, Stephen Curry, and others get the Starting Lineup treatment with $50 toys that include NFT cards.
articles.title: Remember Starting Lineup NBA Action Figures? They’re Back—With NFTs

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Former US Senator Max Baucus will chair the Board, which also includes a former Obama advisor and policy experts from around the world.
articles.title: Binance Taps Former Obama Advisor for New Global Advisory Board

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: On previous occasions, Dimon has described JPMorgan as being 'at the forefront' of DeFi and blockchain, and said that Bitcoin is 'worthless.'
articles.title: JPMorgan CEO Jamie Dimon: Crypto Tokens, Bitcoin Are 'Decentralized Ponzi Schemes'

articles.author: Tom Farren
articles.description: The blockchain network has unveiled a prototype of its games console, which aims to 'hide the complexity of Web3 from the end-user.'
articles.title: Zilliqa to Launch Web3 Games Console In Early 2023

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Immunefi plans to use the fresh funding to build a new version of its platform and to increase reward payouts for ethical hackers.
articles.title: DeFi Bug Bounty Platform Immunefi Raises $24M in Series A

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Decentralized wireless network Helium has voted to ditch its own blockchain in favor of a move to Solana's network.
articles.title: Helium Community Approves Crypto Wireless Network's Migration to Solana

articles.author: Sujith Somraaj
articles.description: Running counter to the broader crypto market’s bearish price action, DeFi tokens have posted gains over the past 24 hours.
articles.title: DeFi Tokens Defy the Dip as Ethereum Slips Below $1,300

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Changpeng “CZ” Zhao told the crowd at the Mainnet conference to “ride out the winter.”
articles.title: Binance CEO: Bitcoin Bear Market Is 'Healthy' for Crypto Industry Long Term

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: Crypto law commentator Brian Fyre interprets the draft bill as treating blue-chip NFT PFP collections like Bored Apes as securities.
articles.title: Draft EU Law Could See NFTs Regulated as Securities: Law Prof

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: Of all the crypto-related web traffic in the region, more than half of it is going to NFT sites.
articles.title: Ethereum NFTs Are Driving Crypto Adoption in Central and South Asia: Report

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Jesse Powell is stepping down from his role as CEO of Kraken, citing the drain of managing operations and how the role had become “less fun.”
articles.title: Kraken CEO Jesse Powell Steps Down to Focus on Crypto ‘Industry Advocacy’

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Volatility hits the crypto market as the Fed raises interest rates by 75 basis points, meeting market expectations.
articles.title: Bitcoin Dips as Fed Again Raises Interest Rates to Combat Inflation

articles.author: Ziwang
articles.description: After last week's merge event, Australia's financial regulator ASIC is also weighing whether to classify Ethereum as a financial product.
articles.title: Australia’s Financial Watchdog Expands Team to Better Regulate Crypto

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: A bug in the latest upgrade for Arbitrum, an Ethereum scaling network, had been live for almost three weeks, but had not yet been exploited.
articles.title: Hacker Saves Abritrum From Ethereum-Draining Bug in Nitro Upgrade

articles.description: Magic Eden launched 1 year ago and already has a $1.6 billion valuation. It started as a marketplace only for Solana NFTs, but now it’s opening up to Ethereum. Co-founder and CEO Jack Lu tells Dan Roberts and Stephen Graves all about the company’s goals, his take on NFT backlash, Solana vs Ethereum, and the Ethereum merge and its impact on NFTs. Watch and subscribe to the gm podcast on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: Inside NFT Unicorn Magic Eden With CEO Jack Lu

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Cryptocurrency exchanges Binance and FTX have reportedly made the leading bids for the assets of bankrupt crypto lender Voyager Digital.
articles.title: Binance and FTX Lead $50M Race to Purchase Voyager's Assets: Report

articles.author: Ziwang
articles.description: A judge in New York has ordered stablecoin issuer Tether to produce financial documents to assess whether USDT is backed by US dollars.
articles.title: Judge Orders Tether to Produce Records Showing Backing of USDT

articles.description: Web3 fashion startup BNV is building out its own metaverse to better fit the fashion world than the "voxelated" worlds of Sandbox and Decentraland. BNV CEO Richard Hobbs spoke to Decrypt's Sander Lutz about why it's necessary, ahead of BNV's special event during Paris Fashion Week.
articles.title: BNV CEO Richard Hobbs on Creating a Fashion-First Metaverse

articles.author: Ryan Ozawa
articles.description: Algorithmic stablecoins would be shelved for two years of study by federal agencies.
articles.title: Latest Draft of US Crypto Law Would Temporarily Ban Terra-Like Stablecoins

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Jack Lu tells Decrypt about the top Solana marketplace’s embrace of Ethereum—and why Magic Eden was “worried” about the reaction.
articles.title: Magic Eden CEO: ‘Very Natural’ to Expand From Solana to Ethereum NFTs

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: Company CEO Richard Hobbs says creating fashion-first metaverse BNV World will solve a number of issues.
articles.title: Digital Fashion Platform BNV Will Launch Its Own Metaverse

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: All invited speakers agreed that the United States must launch a digital currency to remain globally competitive.
articles.title: US Digital Currency a ‘Unanimous Need’ to Compete With China: House Committee

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Both ETC and Ravencoin saw their prices fall double digits.
articles.title: Ethereum Classic Plummets 23% Over Post-Merge Week

articles.author: Tom Farren
articles.description: OpenSea has slated a September 21 launch for Arbitrum, adding to the four existing chains currently on the marketplace.
articles.title: NFT Marketplace OpenSea to Integrate Ethereum Scaling Solution Arbitrum

articles.author: Sujith Somraaj
articles.description: Ethereum miners appear to have cashed in big leading up to the network’s highly-anticipated merge event last week.
articles.title: Miners Sold Nearly 15,000 Ethereum Leading Up to the Merge

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Axie’s newly-crowned champions speak with Decrypt about Web3 esports and how their competitive focus sets them apart.
articles.title: How METAT8 Esports Dominated the Axie Infinity World Championship

articles.author: Ziwang
articles.description: Crypto exchange Binance has expanded its BUSD stablecoin to the Ethereum scaler Polygon and the speedy layer-1 blockchain Avalanche.
articles.title: Binance Expands Stablecoin BUSD to Polygon, Avalanche

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: Robinhood today announced that it would be adding the industry’s second-largest stablecoin as part of its crypto push.
articles.title: Robinhood Lists USDC as First Stablecoin on Trading Platform

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The business intelligence firm Microstrategy says it has now spent a total of $3.98 billion on its Bitcoin bet.
articles.title: Microstrategy Stock Drops 6% Amid Latest $6M Bitcoin Buy

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Helium Mobile will tap both the decentralized 5G network and T-Mobile’s service while also offering crypto rewards to users.
articles.title: Helium Founders, T-Mobile Launch Crypto-Powered 5G Mobile Service

articles.author: Ziwang
articles.description: The exchange provider is taking on established crypto players such as Coinbase in its bid to win over institutional investors.
articles.title: Nasdaq to Launch Institutional Crypto Custody Service: Report

articles.author: Sujith Somraaj
articles.description: The coin powering Bored Ape Yacht Club’s ecosystem is up over 10% in the last day as its staking program nears its launch.
articles.title: ApeCoin Jumps Double-Digits as Staking Program Draws Near

articles.author: Tom Farren
articles.description: Wintermute stated that it has no solvency concerns, while issuing an open call to the hacker to engage in a whitehat response.
articles.title: Algorithmic Market Maker Wintermute Hacked for $160M

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Sam Bankman-Fried’s crypto trading firm Alameda Research will return about $200 million in cryptocurrencies to the now-bankrupt Voyager Digital.
articles.title: Alameda to Repay $200M in Bitcoin and Ethereum to Bankrupt Crypto Broker Voyager

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: After voting to make victims of the $80 million hack whole back in May, the community is finally making good on its proposal.
articles.title: Tribe DAO Votes to Repay Rari Capital Hack Victims—Again

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: In a civil complaint against a crypto influencer, the SEC suggested that it believes the U.S. government has jurisdiction over all Ethereum transactions.
articles.title: SEC Claims All of Ethereum Falls Under US Jurisdiction

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Metaplex will launch a DAO to enable community governance, with non-U.S. creators set to reap the reward of MPLX tokens.
articles.title: Metaplex Set to Airdrop MPLX Tokens to Solana NFT Creators

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The Canadian mining company says its Rio Cuarto facility has already boosted its hashrate.
articles.title: New Bitfarms Operation in Argentina Slashes Costs With Natural Gas

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: One crypto intelligence firm revisits its selloff predictions from a month ago.
articles.title: How Ethereum Traders Actually Played the Merge

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Eth.link was “sniped” earlier this month after an expiration date snafu led to a $850,000 auction.
articles.title: Ethereum Name Service Regains Control of EthLink Domain in Lawsuit Against GoDaddy

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The Treasury's questionnaire is designed to assess how the government can better address crime associated with crypto.
articles.title: Treasury Asks for Public Input to Shape Crypto Regulations—Including NFTs and DeFi

articles.description: The Ethereum merge will happen this week. In this serving of Decrypt-O's, Kate Irwin explains the Bellatrix upgrade and the shadow fork, Dan Roberts predicts the impact Ethereum's move to proof of stake will have on Bitcoin's energy use PR problem (plus commentary from Dan Held from the gm podcast), and Sander Lutz hits the street in Hollyweird to ask regular folks if they know and care about the merge. (Production by Zack Edelman, editing by Jason Nelson.)
articles.title: Decrypt-O's Ep. 2: Who Cares About the Ethereum Merge?

articles.description: The Ethereum Merge to Proof of Stake (PoS) is one of the most significant technological upgrades in recent history. But why evolve Ethereum at all? Learn the difference between PoW and PoS, why PoS will decrease Ethereum’s carbon footprint by 99.95%, and more in the Infura Web3 Dev Series: The Merge Explained. Author: Clarissa Watson, Senior Tech Writer at ConsenSys.
articles.title: Decrypt Learn: The Ethereum Merge

articles.description: The years-anticipated Ethereum Merge is less than a week away. Everyone is buzzing about what it will mean for the crypto market and for proof of work vs proof of stake, but what will the effect be on NFTs? Dan Roberts, Andrew Hayward, Kate Irwin and Sander Lutz break it down in our latest live roundtable.
articles.title: #DecryptLIVE: What the Ethereum Merge Means for NFTs

articles.description: Eat your Decrypt-O’s! In the debut episode, Sander Lutz hits the street to ask people about their privacy concerns in the wake of the government’s Tornado Cash crackdown; Kate Irwin shares headlines on the wackiest Web3 stories, from Crypto.com sending a woman $10 million by accident to Eminem and Snoop Dogg getting Twitter hate for their Bored Apes; and Dan Roberts serves up a rant about Gary Gensler. (Production and editing by Zack Edelman.)
articles.title: Decrypt-O's Ep. 1: Tornado Cash Privacy Fears, Bored Ape VMAs Hate, Sheriff Gensler

articles.description: Dan Held is an old-school Bitcoiner who has been in the space since the very beginning; he sold his price app ZeroBlock to Blockchain.info in 2013. But while he's largely seen as a Bitcoin maximalist by his half a million fans on Twitter, he tells Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott he's a "permissive" and "open-minded" Bitcoiner: he's watching the Ethereum Merge closely, and he admits Ethereum's move to proof of stake will put pressure on Bitcoin's energy use. Watch Episode 18 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: Bitcoiner Dan Held Talks Ethereum Merge, PoW vs PoS, and NFTs

articles.description: Decrypt’s Dan Roberts, Stacy Elliott, Jason Nelson, and Sander Lutz break down all the angles, from the timing to the expected market reaction to the technical elements.
articles.title: #DecryptLIVE: Ethereum Merge Is on the Horizon

articles.description: Baek Kim of Hashed, Grace Isford of Lux Capital, Sarah Kunst of Cleo Capital, Peter Najarian of RW3 Ventures, and Edward Moncada of Protofund talk to Decrypt's Dan Roberts onstage at FTX's Crypto Bahamas event about VCs and family offices allocating money into crypto and the outlook for institutional DeFi.
articles.title: VCs and Family Offices Go Crypto: Hashed, Lux, Cleo, RW3 and Protofund at Crypto Bahamas

articles.description: Scott Hansen aka Tycho, the musician, producer, and songwriter, tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin how he caught the crypto bug and why he believes Web3 can change the music industry for the better.
articles.title: From Silk Road to Buying ETH: How Musician Tycho Went Crypto

articles.description: Decentralized Pictures, the nonprofit co-founded by Roman Coppola, is enabling on-chain voting to greenlight and fund film projects. CEO Leo Matchett tells Dan Roberts and Stephen Graves how the anti-crypto stigma in Hollywood is fading, how Web3 can bring more diversity to the film world and disrupt the traditional gatekeepers, and how he first got into crypto when he and Coppola set up a Bitcoin miner in an empty sound stage.
articles.title: gm: Decentralized Pictures CEO on How Web3 Can Change Hollywood
